mapper.select: SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, ADULT_PRICE, ROOT, p.PRODUCT_CODE FROM TA_PRODUCT p, TA_PROIMG pi WHERE p.PRODUCT_CODE = pi.PRODUCT_CODE AND p.NATION_CODE = #{nation_code}
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, ADULT_PRICE, ROOT, p.PRODUCT_CODE FROM TA_PRODUCT p, TA_PROIMG pi WHERE p.PRODUCT_CODE = pi.PRODUCT_CODE AND p.CITY_CODE = #{city_code}

SELECT * FROM TA_PRODUCT p , TA_CITY c, TA_NATION n, TA_PROIMG pi WHERE p.PRODUCT_CODE = #{product_code} AND p.CITY_CODE = c.CITY_CODE AND c.NATION_CODE = n.NATION_CODE AND p.PRODUCT_CODE = pi.PRODUCT_CODE
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, ADULT_PRICE, ROOT, p.PRODUCT_CODE FROM TA_PRODUCT p, TA_PROIMG pi WHERE p.PRODUCT_CODE = pi.PRODUCT_CODE AND p.CATEGORIZATION = '인기상품' AND ROWNUM <=6
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, ADULT_PRICE, ROOT, p.PRODUCT_CODE FROM TA_PRODUCT p, TA_PROIMG pi WHERE p.PRODUCT_CODE = pi.PRODUCT_CODE AND p.CATEGORIZATION = '특가상품' AND ROWNUM <=5
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, ADULT_PRICE, ROOT, p.PRODUCT_CODE, p.CATEGORIZATION FROM TA_PRODUCT p, TA_PROIMG pi WHERE p.PRODUCT_CODE = pi.PRODUCT_CODE AND p.CATEGORIZATION = #{CATEGORIZATION}
SELECT PRODUCT_NAME, ADULT_PRICE, ROOT, p.PRODUCT_CODE, p.CATEGORIZATION FROM TA_PRODUCT p, TA_PROIMG pi WHERE p.PRODUCT_CODE = pi.PRODUCT_CODE AND p.THEME = #{theme}

SELECT p.PRODUCT_NAME, p.ADULT_PRICE, pi.ROOT, p.PRODUCT_CODE, p.CATEGORIZATION FROM (SELECT * FROM TA_PRODUCT ORDER BY DEPARTURE_DATE) p, TA_PROIMG pi WHERE p.PRODUCT_CODE = pi.PRODUCT_CODE AND rownum <= 2
